data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pešić, Vladimir, Smit, Harry (2012): Water mites of the genus Monatractides (Acari: Hydrachnidia, Torrenticolidae) from Australia, with descriptions of four new species. Zootaxa 3248: 1-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.209671
